e:AD-2.22.e:Title: FLIGHT PROCEDURES
e:AD-2.22.x:p: Visual circling in the northern sector of RWY 12/30 is prohibited for speed category C and D aircraft.

e:AD-2.23.e:Title: ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
e:AD-2.23.x:p: The active glider starting zone and the appropriate placement of the winch-start aggregate is selected according to the actual meteorological conditions.
